original_text: The next day Paul took the men and purified himself along with them. Then he went to the temple to give notice of the date when the days of purification would end and the offering would be made for each of them.
korean_text: 바울이 이 사람들을 데리고 이튿날 그들과 함께 결례를 행하고 성전에 들어가서 각 사람을 위하여 제사 드릴 때까지의 결례 기간이 만기된 것을 신고하니라

sentences.original_text: The next day Paul took the men
sentences.korean_translation: 다음 날 바울이 그 사람들을 데리고

sentences.original_text: and purified himself along with them
Then he went to the temple
to give notice of the date
when the days of purification would end
and the offering would be made
